definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: For different geological condition, the under-ground detecting radar will show different spectrum characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 不同的地質條件，探地雷達將表現爲不同的波譜特徵。

sentences.english: Its physicochemical properties and spectrometry proved the compound was psoralidin.
sentences.chinese: 理化性質和波譜分析證明該化合物爲補骨脂裏定。

sentences.english: This model can separate spectral mixed pixels with very high accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 該模型可以高度精確地分離出波譜混迭的象元。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the theory of several useful spectroscopies and their applications.
sentences.chinese: 介紹幾種常用波譜的工作原理及應用。

sentences.english: Microwave spectroscopist have determined the rotational constants for many molecules.
sentences.chinese: 微波波譜學家已經確定了許多分子的轉動常數。

sentences.english: It was identified to be swainsonine by physicochemical properties and spectral data analyses.
sentences.chinese: 經理化常數測定和波譜分析鑑定爲苦馬豆素。

sentences.english: These 'earth brainwaves´ are identical to the spectrum of our brainwaves.
sentences.chinese: 這些“地球腦波”與我們人類腦波的波譜相同。

sentences.english: Results The crystal was determined as emodin by means of spectra .
sentences.chinese: 結果經波譜法鑑定所得結晶爲大黃素。
